item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 1:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Assassination Is a Leaky Abstraction (13 points | discuss)

11. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (56 points | 12 comments)

27. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (151 points | 40 comments)
28. Congo gov. says it's 'on alert' over mystery flu-like disease that killed dozens (120 points | 57 comments)
29. cli53 – Command line tool for Amazon Route 53 (49 points | 5 comments)
30. Tsunami Warning for Northern California (283 points | 162 comments)
